attributes.action: Remove the exemption of places of worship from gatherings in level 5 lockdowns.
attributes.additional_details: Change the regulations for level 5 lockdowns to include the closure of places of worship.
attributes.background: The removal of the exemption of closure for places of worship should include all services and private prayer; but exceptions could be made for limited attendance funerals and weddings; the latter being for a couple where one party has a terminal illness with short life expectancy.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564236
